span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 深思熟虑的，谨慎地： deliberated, calculated
【例】 a measured response to the terrorist attack 就恐怖袭击做出的深思熟虑的反应
【近】 deliberated, advised, calculated, considered, knowing, reasoned, studied, thoughtful, weighed
【反】 casual 随意的 ；uncalculated, unconsidered, unstudied 没仔细考虑过的
【记】 measure 测量
